research_list.name: NPST
research_list.market_position: Indian fintech company specializing in payment solutions and digital transformation, expanding internationally.
research_list.future_outlook: Transitioning to NSE and BSE Mainboards, expanding into embedded finance, AI-driven risk and compliance solutions, and B2B bill payments. Recorded a 78.5% year-on-year increase in revenue for the first nine months of FY25.
research_list.investment_potential: Stellar performance in FY 2024, securing orders for innovative solutions, expansion into new verticals and international markets. Stock has exhibited high volatility and recent decline in net sales.

research_list.name: NuSummit
research_list.market_position: Technology company specializing in AI, cloud, cybersecurity, and business modernization, particularly for the BFSI sector. Backed by Investcorp.
research_list.future_outlook: Rebranding marks a transformative milestone, increasing focus on global markets, providing advanced cybersecurity, cloud transformation, and digital solutions.
research_list.investment_potential: Investcorp's acquisition indicates strong confidence. Rebranding and focus on global expansion suggest a strategic shift. Expertise in high-demand areas. As a private company, direct investment is not possible.
